channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NE
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NE

item.title: Report X-2024030980
item.description:
Report X-2024030980

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-28T00:34:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-14
  • City: NORTH PLATTE
  • State: NE
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: Union Pacific Railroad
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 2
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 791418
  • Serious Incident Ind: Yes
  • Description: Liquid product released from unknown cause came into contact with wooden container floor resulting in an exothermic reaction within the closed space. Container exploded causing a release and burning of all product in 56 drums.
